title: Database Server Patching
description: An analyst must apply a critical security patch to a production database server, which requires downtime.

tasks.description: Coordinate with the application owners to schedule a maintenance window for the database server.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst successfully negotiates and schedules a maintenance window.

tasks.description: Before the window, take a snapshot of the database server so it can be rolled back in case of issues.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst successfully creates a backup snapshot.

tasks.description: During the maintenance window, apply the security patch and reboot the server, then verify with the application owners that the application is functioning correctly.
tasks.expected_outcome: The patch is applied successfully, and the application is confirmed to be working, completing the maintenance.
